results.title: Association between statin use and 30-day mortality among patients with sepsis-associated encephalopathy: a retrospective cohort study.
results.text_hl: Conclusion: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ who were treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ were associated with lower odds of 30-day mortality in @<m>DISEASE_Sepsis_Associated_Encephalopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065166 @@@SAE@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
